mapper.update: UPDATE ss_annual_adjust_company_emp_temp t1 SET t1.error_msg = IF(t1.error_msg IS NULL, #{columnCN}, CONCAT(t1.error_msg,',',#{columnCN})) WHERE t1.annual_adjust_company_id = #{annualAdjustCompanyId} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ss_annual_adjust_employee saae WHERE saae.company_id = #{companyId} AND saae.adjust_year = YEAR(NOW()) AND saae.employee_id = t1.employee_id AND saae.employee_name = t1.employee_name AND saae.ss_serial = t1.ss_serial AND saae.is_active = 1 )
